segments.text: You are looking really healthy lately . What are you doing differently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for noticing ! I've been making a few lifestyle changes over the past year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me about it . I'm interested .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it all started when my brother challenged me to quit smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ha ! That's right . You used to smoke . I forgot !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I kicked that habit , I found I had so much more energy . I started exercising .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I like to be outside . I took up hiking and mountain biking .
segments.speaker: S2
